text.name: Reversed Beats / Reversed Arcana Slave
text.desc:
This Skill deals -50% damage against sub-targets

[WhenUse] Consume all [HystericGauge] to gain Clash Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] Count to gain Clash Power (Clash Power +1 for every 8 Count consumed, max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +15% damage for every [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] on self (max 60%)
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [ArcanaQueenOfHate] on self to gain +1 Atk Weight
[BeforeAttack] If this Skill only has a single target(for Focused Encounters, a Part), but has 2+ Atk Weight, deal +20% damage
[BeforeAttack] Base Power -6 for every Cracked Coin (max -18)
[EndBattle] If this unit isn't at -45 SP, and is at less than 0 SP, heal 10 SP. Heal more SP the further this unit's SP value is from 0 (2 SP healed for every missing SP, max 50 SP)
[WhenUse] Lose 10 SP

text.name: Reversed Beats / Reversed Arcana Slave
text.desc:
This Skill deals -50% damage against sub-targets

[WhenUse] Consume all [HystericGauge]; <style="highlight">Clash Power +1 for every Stack consumed (max 3)
[WhenUse] Consume [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] Count to gain Clash Power (Clash Power +1 for every <style="highlight">5 Count consumed, max <style="highlight">4)
[WhenUse] Deal +<style="highlight">30% damage for every [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] on self (max <style="highlight">150%)
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [ArcanaQueenOfHate] on self; <style="highlight">gain +1 Atk Weight for every Stack consumed (max 3)
- If this Skill consumed 3 [HystericGauge], gain +1 Atk Weight
[BeforeAttack] If this Skill only has a single target(for Focused Encounters, a Part), <style="highlight">deal +(20 x (Atk Weight - 1))% damage (max 80%)
[BeforeAttack] Base Power -6 for every Cracked Coin (max -18)
[EndBattle] If this unit isn't at -45 SP, and is at less than 0 SP, heal 10 SP. Heal more SP the further this unit's SP value is from 0 (2 SP healed for every missing SP, max 50 SP)
[WhenUse] Lose 10 SP

1031201.name: Magical Girl of Love / Queen of Hatred

1031202.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - !ALERT: E.G.O GEAR SYNC THRESHOLD EXCEEDED!
1031202.desc:
Gain 1 [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] Count in this Encounter

Encounter Start: if this unit does not have [HystericGauge], gain [HystericGauge]

Encounter Start: if this unit does not have [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate], gain [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate]

Turn Start:
- At 0 or higher SP, gain [MagicalGirlAppear] and lose [NoVillain]
- At less than 0 SP, gain [NoVillain] and lose [MagicalGirlAppear]

This unit's SP cannot drop below -40 due to the SP loss effects from this unit's Base Attack Skills

1031211.name: Magical Girl of Love / Queen of Hatred
1031211.desc:
Deal +2% damage for every [ThePowerOfLoveAndHate] (max 10%)
Combat Start: gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]

1031221.name: Magical Power Charging Support
1031221.desc:
If, among allies that gain [Charge] Count with their Base Attack Skills, 1 ally with the least [Charge] Count uses a Base Attack Skill that gains [Charge] Count, they gain +2 [Charge] Count (2 times per turn)
- At 0 or higher SP: heal ([Charge] on target x 2) HP (max 10; heals up to 20 per turn)
- At less than 0 SP: heal ([Charge] on target) SP (max 5; heals up to 10 per turn)
